typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	hashVal as string,
	TargetID as string,
	hashDiff as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> DataVaultSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HUBSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SATSource
DataVaultSource derive(each(match(name==$hashVal), replace($$, $hashVal, $TargetID) = toString(sha2(256, toString(byName($hashVal)), currentTimestamp()) )),
		HKey = toString(sha2(256, toString(byName($hashVal))) ),
		hashDiffValue = sha2(256, columns()),
		LoadDateTime = currentTimestamp()) ~> hashKeys
TargetHubKey, hashKeys exists(HKey == hashID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NewRows
HUBSource derive(hashID = toString(byName($TargetID))) ~> TargetHubKey
InsertSatRows select(mapColumn(
		HKey = hashID,
		each(match(name==$hashVal))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> NewHubRecords
hashKeys select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name!=$hashVal)),
		each(match(name=='hashDiffValue'),
			$hashDiff = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameCols
SATSource derive(hashID = toString(byName($TargetID)),
		hashDiff = toString(byName($hashDiff)),
		LoadDateTime = toTimestamp(byName('LoadDateTime'))) ~> TargetSATKey
RenameCols, TargetSATKey exists(HKey == hashID
	&& hashDiffValue == hashDiff
	&& RenameCols@LoadDateTime == TargetSATKey@LoadDateTime,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SatRowsExist
NewRows alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> InsertSatRows
SatRowsExist alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> NewSATRecords
NewHubRecords sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> HubLoad
NewSATRecords sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		HKey,
		LoadDateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2) ~> SATLoad
